about_the_game:
Become afflicted by the Scarab Bracelet with the "Bolthorn the Cursed" Hero Skin, a full-body customization of the Raider. After traveling to a distant land, Bolthorn brought back the ancient relic to bring glory to his clan. But what he didn't know was that he had just unleashed a terrible curse upon his land.

The "Bolthorn the Cursed" Hero Skin offer includes:

- One Raider Hero Skin.
- Seven-Day Champion Status.
- Three Scavenger Crates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 | AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 / GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM | AMD Radeon R9 270 / R9 370 / RX460 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
